column2: "Na abɔfo beesuon no a wokitsakitsa nkɔɔpow esuon no mu baako bae nye me bɛkasae
column5: ma menkyerɛ wo edwaman kɛse no a ɔtse esu pii do no n’atsɛmbu."

column2: "Ɔno na asaase do ahemfo nye no agor ndwamangor
column3: na no ndwaman wenyin abobow hɔn a wɔtsetse asaase do no."

column2: "Na ɔdze me nam Sunsum mu kɔr sar do: na muhun ɔbaa bi a ɔtse abowa memen bi do
column3: na ebususɛm edzin ahyɛ no ma
column4: na ɔwɔ etsir esuon nye mmbɛn du."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no hyɛ atar serdaa nye memen
column3: na wɔahyehyɛ no sika nye aboɔdzen bo
column5: na okitsa sika kɔɔpow a ekyiwadze nye no ndwamanyɛ fi ahyɛ no ma

column2: "na wɔakyerɛw dzin bi wɔ no momapɔw do dɛ
column5: NDWAMAN NYE ASAASE DO EKYIWADZE NE NA."

column2: "Na muhun ɔbaa no dɛ ahotseweefo no bɔgyaa nye Jesus atɔfo bɔgyaa abow no. Na muhunii no

column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na ɔyɛ wo nwanwa? Mebɛka wo ɔbaa no nye abowa a ɔso no a ɔwɔ etsir esuon nye mmbɛn du no ho esumasɛm no."

column5: na oribefi bun no mu aba
column6: na ɔakɔ ɔsɛɛ mu. Na ɔbɛyɛ hɔn a wɔtsetse asaase a woemmfi wiadze ahyɛse annkyerɛw hɔn edzin wɔ nkwa nwoma no mu no nwanwa
column7: dɛ wobohu abowa no a nkyɛ ɔwɔ hɔ

column2: "Eha na adwen a ɔwɔ nyansa wɔ. Etsir esuon no yɛ mbepɔw esuon a ɔbaa no tse do:"
"na wɔyɛ ahemfo esuon; na beenum ahwe ase
column4: na ɔbaako no so nnyae mmbae; na sɛ ɔba a

column2: "Na abowa no a nkyɛ ɔwɔ hɔ
"Na mmbɛn du no a ihunii no
column3: wɔyɛ ahemfo du a wonnyae nnyaa ahendzi; naaso wɔnye abowa no nya tum dɛ ahemfo dɔnhwer kor."
na wɔdze hɔn tum nye ahoɔdzen ma abowa no."

column2: "Iyinom na wɔnye Eguambaa no bedzi ako
column3: na Eguambaa no bedzi hɔn do konyim
column5: nye ahemfo Hen; na hɔn a wɔafrɛ hɔn

column3: Esu no a ihun dɛ ɔbaa no tse do no yɛ nkorɔfo nye nyimpadodow

column2: "Na mmbɛn du no a ihunii no
column8: na wɔdze ogya ahyew no koraa."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn dze hyɛɛ hɔn akoma mu dɛ wɔnyɛ ne tsirmsɛm
column4: na wɔmfa hɔn ahenman mma abowa no nkesi dɛ Nyankopɔn asɛm no bɛba mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no a ihun no no
column3: nye kurow kɛse no a odzi hen wɔ asaase ahemfo do no."
